mapper.update: UPDATE product SET productTypeId = #{productTypeId}, companyId = #{companyId}, description = #{description}, dutyTypeId = #{dutyTypeId}, processNo = #{processNo}, owner = #{owner}, pieceId = #{pieceId}, standardId = #{standardId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.productNo, pt.typeName, po.objectName,pdt.name AS dutyTypeName, ps.name AS standardName, sc.companyName,su.userName,p.createDate,p.owner,sc.areaId FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_object po ON p.objectId = po.objectId LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON p.productTypeId = pt.typeId LEFT JOIN product_duty_type pdt ON p.dutyTypeId = pdt.typeId LEFT JOIN productive_standard ps ON p.standardId = ps.standardId LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON p.companyId = sc.companyId LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON p.cUserId = su.userId WHERE p.id = #{id}
